data_description.add_another: Choose this to return to the dog form and configure an additional pet. Leave unchecked to move on to profile selection.
Enable to add one more dog before moving on. Disable to continue with global settings.

data_description.dog_age: Provide the age in years so Paw Control can tailor activity and feeding guidance.
data_description.dog_breed: Optional detail that improves nutrition and health recommendations.
data_description.dog_id: Use a short lowercase identifier. It becomes part of the entity IDs created for this dog.
data_description.dog_name: Friendly display name used in dashboards and notifications.
data_description.dog_size: Select the size profile that best matches your dog for defaults and summaries.
data_description.dog_weight: Used to calculate meal portions and health thresholds.

data_description.compact_mode: Tighten spacing so the dashboard fits small screens more comfortably.
data_description.create_per_dog_dashboards: Create separate dashboard tabs for each dog when multiple pets exist.

data_description.dashboard_template: Decide which layout template Paw Control should start from.

{dashboard_info}

data_description.door_sensor: Optional door sensor that triggers visitor or garden automations.
data_description.gps_source: Choose which device tracker or person entity Paw Control should use for GPS.
data_description.notify_fallback: Optional notification service used when direct device notifications fail.

configure_external_entities.description:
🔗 **External Entity Configuration**

Paw Control needs to connect to existing Home Assistant entities for full functionality. This step is required for Platinum quality alignment.

**Required for GPS tracking:** Device tracker or Person entity
**Optional for visitor detection:** Door sensor
**Optional for notifications:** Custom notification service
**Optional for weather health:** Weather entity

⚠️ If no entities are available, you can configure them manually later.
configure_external_entities.title: Configure External Entities

data_description.data_retention_days: Number of days to keep historical metrics before pruning old entries.
data_description.debug_logging: Enable verbose logging to help troubleshoot issues during setup.
data_description.enable_analytics: Collect anonymous trend data to power overview widgets and reports.
data_description.enable_cloud_backup: Upload Paw Control configuration and history to your configured cloud target.
data_description.performance_mode: Select how resource-intensive Paw Control should be for this installation. Defaults to balanced and automatically normalises legacy "standard" entries.

configure_modules.title: Global Settings

data_description.breakfast_enabled: Enable if this dog should receive a morning meal.

data_description.daily_food_amount: Total amount of food (in grams) to distribute across all meals.
data_description.dinner_enabled: Enable if this dog should receive an evening meal.

data_description.enable_reminders: Send Home Assistant reminders ahead of each scheduled meal.

data_description.snacks_enabled: Track snacks separately from regular meals.

data_description.gps_update_interval: How frequently to request new GPS data. Shorter intervals use more battery.
data_description.home_zone_radius: Define the radius of the safe home zone used for geofencing alerts.

data_description.activity_level: Overall activity level to balance calorie suggestions.

data_description.low_fat: Flag that the dog uses a low-fat diet plan.

data_description.organic: Flag that the dog uses organic food.

data_description.sensitive_stomach: Flag that the dog uses a sensitive stomach formula.
data_description.spayed_neutered: Indicate if the dog is spayed/neutered for health calculations.

data_description.vet_phone: Contact number displayed in emergency notifications.
data_description.weight_control: Flag that the dog uses a weight-control diet plan.
data_description.weight_goal: Choose whether the dog should maintain, lose, or gain weight.
data_description.weight_tracking: Enable to log weight entries and show weight trend sensors.

user.description:
Welcome to Paw Control! Let's set up smart dog management for your Home Assistant.

This integration will help you track feeding, walks, health, and GPS location for your dogs.
user.title: Set up Paw Control

coordinator_error.description: Paw Control could not access its coordinator ({error}). Follow the suggested action or reload the integration.
coordinator_error.title: Coordinator is unavailable

door_sensor_persistence_failure.description: Paw Control n'a pas pu enregistrer la configuration du capteur de porte pour {dog_name} ({dog_id}). Capteur : {door_sensor}. Erreur : {error}. Dernière tentative : {timestamp}.
door_sensor_persistence_failure.title: Door sensor settings could not be saved

duplicate_dog_ids.description: The following IDs are used more than once: {duplicate_ids}. Each of the {total_dogs} dogs must have a unique ID.
duplicate_dog_ids.title: Duplicate dog IDs detected

feeding_compliance_alert.description: The latest feeding compliance check covering {days_to_check} days scored {compliance_score}% with {issue_count} issue(s) and {missed_meal_count} missed meal(s). Key findings: {issue_summary}. Missed meals: {missed_meal_summary}. Next steps: {recommendations_summary}. Checked at {checked_at}.
feeding_compliance_alert.title: Feeding compliance issues for {dog_name}

feeding_compliance_no_data.description: The latest feeding compliance check covering {days_to_check} days could not generate a report: {message}.
feeding_compliance_no_data.title: Feeding telemetry missing for {dog_name}

gps_update_interval_warning.description: The GPS update interval is {current_interval} seconds. Increase it to at least {recommended_interval} seconds to reduce load.
gps_update_interval_warning.title: GPS updates are too frequent

invalid_dog_data.description: Some dogs are missing required information: {invalid_dogs}. Provide a name and ID for each of the {total_dogs} dogs.
invalid_dog_data.title: Incomplete dog details

invalid_gps_configuration.description: GPS tracking is enabled for {gps_enabled_dogs} dog(s), but no GPS source is selected. Choose a GPS source in the options.
invalid_gps_configuration.title: GPS source missing

missing_dog_configuration.description: Paw Control needs at least one dog profile. Configure a dog to continue. Dogs configured: {dogs_count}.
missing_dog_configuration.title: Add at least one dog

missing_notification_config.description: The {missing_service} notification service is not available. {notification_enabled_dogs} dog(s) rely on this service.
missing_notification_config.title: Notification service unavailable

module_configuration_conflict.description: {intensive_dogs} dog(s) use all intensive modules out of {total_dogs} configured. Disable some modules or enable performance mode.
module_configuration_conflict.title: Too many intensive modules enabled

outdated_configuration.description: The configuration entry uses version {current_version}. Update it to version {required_version} through the options flow.
outdated_configuration.title: Update the configuration entry

performance_warning.description: You configured {dog_count} dogs, which may affect performance. The recommended maximum is {recommended_max}.
performance_warning.title: Performance tuning recommended

reconfigure_health.description: The last reconfigure at {timestamp} for profile {requested_profile} reported issues: {health_issues}. Additional warnings: {health_warnings}.
reconfigure_health.title: Health issues after reconfigure

reconfigure_warnings.description: The last reconfigure at {timestamp} switched from {previous_profile} to {requested_profile}. Compatibility warnings: {warnings}.
reconfigure_warnings.title: Profile change produced warnings

runtime_store_compatibility.description: Paw Control a détecté des métadonnées du magasin d'exécution avec l'état {status} pour {config_entry_id}. Instantané de l'entrée : statut {entry_status}, version {entry_version}, créé {entry_created_version}. Instantané du magasin de domaine : statut {store_status}, version {store_version}, créé {store_created_version}. Schéma actuel {current_version}, compatibilité minimale {minimum_compatible_version}. Divergence détectée : {divergence_detected}.
runtime_store_compatibility.title: Le cache d'exécution requiert une attention

storage_warning.description: Data retention is set to {current_retention} days. Reduce it to {recommended_max} days to keep the database lean.
storage_warning.title: Storage retention is too long

data_description.manual_breaker_event: Event type that triggers breaker follow-up actions on demand. Leave blank to disable manual breaker escalations. Known values: {manual_breaker_event_options}.
data_description.manual_check_event: Event type that triggers an on-demand resilience check. Leave blank to disable manual checks. Known values: {manual_check_event_options}.
data_description.manual_guard_event: Event type that triggers guard follow-up actions on demand. Leave blank to disable manual guard escalations. Known values: {manual_guard_event_options}.
data_description.performance_mode: Select how aggressively Paw Control refreshes data and schedules jobs.
data_description.reset_time: Choose when Paw Control performs daily maintenance tasks.
data_description.resilience_breaker_threshold: Open or half-open breaker count that triggers escalation follow-ups (0 disables breaker escalations).
data_description.resilience_skip_threshold: Number of skipped guard executions before the escalation script raises an alert (0 disables guard escalations).
